[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"ReactUnity doesn’t have many users yet, but there are some projects that are already using it. If you want your work to be listed here, please contact us."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Here are some projects that are using ReactUnity:"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"games","children":"Games"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"containcorp","children":"Containcorp"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Containcorp is a story-driven management simulation game inspired by the SCP Universe, Rimworld and Prison architect."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"It has a lot of UI elements and complex UI interactions. Developers chose ReactUnity to build the UI for the game."}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":"This is a simple minesweeper game made with Unity. The author built two versions of the game, one with Unity and another with ReactUnity."}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["You can play the game’s non-ReactUnity version ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dimapepino.itch.io/minesweeper","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"here"}],". The ReactUnity version is not available to play online, but its source code can be found ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/kukumberman/unity-minesweeper/tree/react-unity","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"here"}],"."]}]]}]]
